hackathon-description-text: Sign up to the first ever 24 hour hackathon hosted at the University of Bath! It doesn't matter how good at coding you are, if you want to enjoy a FREE weekend of
hackathon-rules:
MLH Code of Conduct 
.
 
You must have a prototype of some sort, not just an idea and wireframes.
